title: Pizza sauce for kids
time: Takes 5-10 minutes to make, 30 minutes to cook
description: This easy tomato sauce, from chef Francesco Mazzei, is the ideal pizza sauce for kids to help make with you. Use to top homemade pizza bases.
ingredients: 400g fresh or canned plum tomatoes, chopped

method.Step 1: Heat the oil in a large sauté pan over a gentle heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook very gently for about 10 minutes until soft – don’t let them brown. Add the remaining ingredients and season. Stir, then simmer for 20 minutes until you have a thickish sauce. If using fresh tomatoes, you will need to break them up with a spoon.

method.Step 2: This keeps well in the fridge, in a sterilised screw-top jar, for up to a week.
